title: Rural Broadband Protection Act of 2025

sentence:
78n) is amended by adding at the end the following:

``(l) Disclosure Relating to Multi-class Share       Structures.--

``(1) Disclosure.--The Commission shall, by rule, require       each issuer with a multi-class share structure to disclose       the information described in paragraph (2) in any proxy or       consent solicitation material for an annual meeting of the       shareholders of the issuer, or any other filing as the       Commission determines appropriate.
title: Enhancing Multi-Class Share Disclosures Act

sentence: The Association       shall file with the Securities and Exchange Commission such       annual and other reports with regard to such securities as       the Commission shall determine to be appropriate in view of       the special character of the Association and its operations       and necessary in the public interest or for the protection of       investors.
